I will reserve my recommendation of this tablet for the moment as I have only had it for 11 days and I am still getting familiar with its operation. I would be happy if someone could advise me as to how to get the 9740 to operate faster online. Apart from that everything else seems to be working well for the moment and performing to expectations. It is quite handy to move around with and great as an E-Reader.

Reviews.Title: Colby Kyros 8 inch Android
Reviews.Author: Faye Toomey
Reviews.Content: I really like my new tablet but I'm still learning how to use all the things it will do.  I find it so much easier to read books than on my Kindle.  The light is better the screen is larger and I love just tapping to turn the page.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Good price and good quality
Reviews.Author: Nerio
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very good, fast and friendly, has a good webcam, the WIFI system is fast, the touch widescreen is perfect, I like this tablet, light and small, and at the same time excellent picture and performance, has micro sd and mini USB input, doesn't have google play or android market, but you can root the tablet and install it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the price, but user should be computer savy.
Reviews.Author: kaiwen yeh
Reviews.Content: Before i purchased the product i did lots of research. The tablet has excellent hardware, with horrible software. But there are several ways that the software problem can be solve if you know your way around linux and not afraid to load custom roms.The tablet doesn't have Google Play, but can be installed by the user if competent with linuxYou can't find a 10" HD screen anywhere at this price point.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Nightmare
Reviews.Author: Renell Guillory
Reviews.Content: I have just emailed Coby consumer care:I purchased two of the Coby Kyros 7-inch Android 4.0 4 GB Internet Tablets, with the 16:9 Capacitive Multi touch Widescreen with built in camera MID7048-4. This is been a nightmare. I know there are different sellers that are selling your products, but this has to be something consistent through the selling process with all vendors, which leads me to believe that Coby is the source of the problem.  The chargers that were sent with the devices do not charge the device, had to go one of the local stores and buy a replacement charger for 40.00 each, so did my sister for her tablet, same tablet order from different seller on amazon.com.  These were supposed to be new devices, I could better understand if they were used or refurbished.  The USB cords sent with the devices are the incorrect USB, and will not even fit into the USB port, incorrect end.  This is totally frustrating. I thought this would be the perfect gift for my for Christmas, but turns out to be the worst nightmare.  I can go on and on with issues, but let me add one more thing. The Amazon App store you can download to the tablet, but once you- close it, then you have uninstall and re-install the app. If you purchase any apps online at the app store, you cannot download them to the tablet. I have paid for several but no way to get them to the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: chanda leatherman
Reviews.Content: It works just like an ipad by apple!!!! In my opinion it works better. I would recommend it to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Fred Gilles
Reviews.Content: I bought one for me and later another for my wife.  Easy to use.  Can be a little slow loading pages, but overall a very nice tablet for the price I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Q.
Reviews.Content: Disappointed that it has a android operating system, but doesn't have the android market. You can't download apps like facebook on the slideMe market, which comes with the tablet. Also, you can't email pics you take. I mainly bought the tablet to Skype, which it does but the quality is questionable. I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Hunk of Junk
Reviews.Author: Christopher Davis
Reviews.Content: This product is a waste of money and will have you ready to throw it out a window.  GetJar App has VERY limited amount of apps available for product and alsmost nothing is free.  Also get used to seeing " Such and Such Program is not responding.  Would you like to close this program"  I see that response more than i actually see a program work.  Usually takes me a good 4-5min and about 6 tries to actually get any program to work.  Seriously regret wasting my money on this item.

Reviews.Title: coby 10in tablet
Reviews.Author: GEORGE W. MILLER SR.
Reviews.Content: love it-beautiful,beautiful,beautiful !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! only complaints- freezes up alot-runs slow at times( especially if more than 1 device using same internet router)

Reviews.Title: Unhappy customer
Reviews.Author: natasha
Reviews.Content: The first 3 days with receiving the 2 Coby 7" tablets the screen on both stuck. I reset them and they started working again and now they have stick again about 10 times and one won't respond to touch. I could not return them because I had already threw away the orginal packaging. Would not advise this product,I order from amazon all the time and this is the first time I was dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tanya T
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old Granddaughter, she loves it. If excedded what I thought it would do. I would recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: jojo
Reviews.Content: Got this for my granddaughter for Christmas and it was a huge hit.. works great and easy to use !

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Matthews
Reviews.Content: Love this product. I take it wherever I go, if I'm going to have to wait at an appointment, etc, to play games and skype and all kinds of other apps. Excellent product. Rivals the iPad even if I can't get the special apps that you can get with the iPad. Very enjoyable and works great.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Irma Licea
Reviews.Content: When you are trying to watch a video on you tube it takes for EVER to load! Very slow. Not what I expected. Looks good and is very nice looking for the price but your games take for ever and sometimes never load.  Keep saying page not responding. Dissapointed!

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a replacement
Reviews.Author: Lickablepiercing73
Reviews.Content: This has got everything I could want. I purchased this to replace a brpken tablet we had that we spent over $300 dolars for. This is way better and it is actually bigger than my old one.

Reviews.Title: small disappointment
Reviews.Author: sean "sm"
Reviews.Content: this is my first review on this tablet in fact this is first tablet ever hence i must in all fairness choose my words carefullyi recently returned this product to amazon because the wifi suddenly stop working i tried what little i could to get it working but to no avail. i did a factory reset and got nothing, i actually made an inquiry on this site and got two responses that kinda aided mw along in my decision to return the tablet. bearing in mind the principle: you get what you pay for i was quite contented with this tablet what should you be expecting for a tab costing under 200. interestingly enough my wife has one also and currently it works like a dream nevertheless amazon dealt with me in a very timely manner i returned the tablet just as i got it in the original packaging and got a full refund after 33 days which i in turn diverted toward another tablet something called a zto 9" i'll let you how that goes the reviews i read are very decent

Reviews.Title: Not an iPad
Reviews.Author: breen
Reviews.Content: This tablet is only really good for Internet use only. Does not have a good selection of apps. If your looking for hassle free and easy this is not the tablet for you.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: loretta rachek
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet itself. I expected to be able to get more apps though. I wanted to get apps such as snap chat and simple games. It's a great tablet but not something I expected.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Tom Carlson
Reviews.Content: Tablet does what I want it to do, but battery life is short. Does work well with usb case and key board

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Orlando Vasquez Nuñez
Reviews.Content: Solida, con velocidad decente mas de lo que se espera recibir por el precio, la recomiendo ampliamente yo volveria a comprar una

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: k.r.
Reviews.Content: I use this mainly for reading, but my husband has been able to find lots of free apps for this, plus can sync our excel program to load spreadsheets onto it and use that on the go.  Good for watching movies, playing games, and the touch screen is great.  My only complaint is the user manual is not very deep, and you have to, if you have no experience with tablets like me, just fiddle with certain things, like figuring how to get icons off the homescreen.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Constance C. Usera
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my husband and he is so happy with it.  I showed him how to use it and he is able to use it without my help.  Great produce and the price was so reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Ok tablet
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: We bought an 8 inch tablet. This was our first tablet. Quality was good. Speed was good. It never froze up on us. The only problem I had was that it came with Get Jar app store and not Amazon app store or Google Play. We couldnt get those to work on it. If you are buying this for cool apps, I would not recommend this tablet. If your buying for other reasons, it is a good tablet.

Reviews.Title: daughters gift
Reviews.Author: DorothyESweatt
Reviews.Content: In my 29 years old daughters words.... this Tablet ROCKS!!she says she couldn't live with out it now...she can do her work on it instead of being at work all night.

Reviews.Title: Super Tablet!
Reviews.Author: susan cummings-rolark
Reviews.Content: My daughter has not put this tablet down since we recieved it. It is a very nice tablet .The clarity is very vivid. She loves how it goes right onto the next selection smoothly with the touch screen. The camera is Awesome as well. I would definetly be buying more products with this name associated with it in the future.Sincerely,A Happy Mother! Sue Gooden

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: The coby tablets does all I need for it to do. I'm so glad I got this as a first tablet . I was able to learn on this one

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: I am getting my third one if this one don't work right I am sending it back and won't buy one like it again

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Jim Ratajski
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a MID 7034-4. For  a few extra bucks, the quality is much superior. Don't waste your time with resistive screens.

Reviews.Title: unable to download from some sites
Reviews.Author: Brian Johnson
Reviews.Content: i have found that when you purchase from some sites, i am unable to download the books. thus a purchase that cannot be used. i have found that it is best to use Amazon only.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work as the info provided
Reviews.Author: S. Gubbine "beanie"
Reviews.Content: I found this product very poor and did not meet the minimum for a tablet.  You can not access the most popular app stores which limits it use and I had to reboot often when accessing the internet.  I did not keep this product based on misrepresentation.

Reviews.Title: She LOVES It!!
Reviews.Author: Doug Longwill
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife mainly to put her scriptures on it.  She can't handle the books with her scriptures anymore due to the weight and the thickness of the volumes.  She has arthritis in her hands so we had to do something.  Well this was the right thing to do!  She LOVES it!!!  It does the job that she expected it to do!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: JESSIE
Reviews.Content: We love our new tablet. I would have given it 5 stars if wouldve supported google play. But for the most part We love it!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Winnie
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my grandaughter! she is able to surf the web, take pictures download music, her homework and special projects. It's very good for the price and beats out most more expensive name brands. The one negative thing is, it freezes  on some things, but all you have to do is reset it and tha appears to do the trick. We haven't figured out why yet, could be some things she may be doing, haven't really viewed the tutorial yet. It has a parental block if you need to use it.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Cesar J. Ordaz Palermo "cordaz"
Reviews.Content: for the price it is an amazing tablet. I get it for my child 6 year old and she love it. The bat thing is that the GetJar (similar to Google market) is not so big. :(

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 9 inch – Good one
Reviews.Author: ManojNarasimhan
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this product. Having used it for almost 4months extensively. I love this and I mainly use this for reading books and watching movies and playing games with my 4year old son and he loves this. The ease of copying files and using them right away is the best option.Pros:CheapEasy to use - Drag and drop filesNo proprietary cable, you can use you portable hard disc or camera cable.32gb expandable microSDHD slotCons:No google playBattery charge(especially when watching videos)No usb portSpeaker volumeGetjar does not have apps like googleplayNo cover available, you have to use a 10 inch cover.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Sunburstlj
Reviews.Content: It's a good tablet, just a little hard to use for kids. The screen display is grainy, but overall a good use.

Reviews.Title: Good transaction bad product.
Reviews.Author: none broken phone
Reviews.Content: This product showed up on time but the product was crappy, it did not even last a month and went dead had to return. Very disappointing to my son because that was a christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: nubien
Reviews.Content: for the price this item is worth it... my only problem is that it didnt come with an APP store setup on it so i cant download a virus protection so i am limited with my downloads....but i love the book stores and reader d camera takes clean photos SO I HOPE SOMEONE CAN HELP ME WITH A VIRUS PROTECTION LINK!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Coby
Reviews.Author: Diana Bohorquez
Reviews.Content: I Like it, great choose... This product is faster, my expectative about it was make... thanks for all service .

Reviews.Title: tableta coby
Reviews.Author: katherine garcia
Reviews.Content: Con los dedos es fácil. Con capacitiva, tecnología multi-touch, esta tableta responde rápida y natural al tacto. Interactuar directamente con lo que hay en la pantalla, pellizcar, tocar, arrastrar o deslizar. encontrará algunos grandes juegos en la tienda libre de Coby Android App. Busque y descargue miles de las aplicaciones más populares. Con rompecabezas, estrategia, acción juegos de carreras, y mucho más, hay algo para todos.

Reviews.Title: Coby
Reviews.Author: Diana Bohorquez
Reviews.Content: I Like it, great choose... This product is faster, my expectative about it was make... thanks for all service .

Reviews.Title: tableta coby
Reviews.Author: katherine garcia
Reviews.Content: Con los dedos es fácil. Con capacitiva, tecnología multi-touch, esta tableta responde rápida y natural al tacto. Interactuar directamente con lo que hay en la pantalla, pellizcar, tocar, arrastrar o deslizar. encontrará algunos grandes juegos en la tienda libre de Coby Android App. Busque y descargue miles de las aplicaciones más populares. Con rompecabezas, estrategia, acción juegos de carreras, y mucho más, hay algo para todos.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: good product and the price is what made me buy it . I needed something not to heavy to pack around at school. I bought the keyboard case with it and this is a perfect set up. It does take some knowledge on how to get around to downloading apps you want ,the get jar app didnt have everything I needed. You do need to install a few different app programs to get arround this issue. If you just stuck with what is on the tablet its pretty boring but learn how to minipulate it and its almost like a mini netbook. I do recomend the key board case to make it more useful, without it i dont think i would like it as much. the tablet its self is fast, volume could be better, and the picture is nice.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 7-Inch Android 4.0 4 GB Internet Tablet 16:9 Capacitive...
Reviews.Author: maria hilda de nobrega
Reviews.Content: The shipment was a success, the best and very good product. me vino con todos sus accesorios, no me quejo

Reviews.Title: sucks! sucks!
Reviews.Author: Julia Rodgers
Reviews.Content: Total waste of money! i bought 3 for Christmas...2 of them don't work any more. One won't charge and the other arrived with damage! I'm sorry i didn't go to job lot and got it there!

Reviews.Title: Awefully Slow!
Reviews.Author: Joshua M
Reviews.Content: This device was slow to browse and amazon app store is glitchy if you are used to play store. I returned the item within 1 week because I couldn't stand it any longer. I would hit the back soft key to go back a page while web browsing and the Kyros takes so long to go back it makes you think you haven't really hit the back key... so you hit it again. But you really did hit the key so now you go back two pages. This scenario happens alot. Waiting on the Kyros to load.

Reviews.Title: no good game app
Reviews.Author: KLOVE
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet, but I couldn't download the Google store app, so I returned it. I suggest that Google store app be accessible.

Reviews.Title: Internal Storage should be 8 GB
Reviews.Author: Dinesh Kumar
Reviews.Content: Very less internal storage left for users. Minimum 8 GB should be there. GPRS service can also be provided. Thanx.

Reviews.Title: It was as advertised
Reviews.Author: AaZz
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoy this tablet.  It does everything that I expected.  The only set back was the Office Suite Software.  It did not operate correctly, and had hidden charges that you don't see until the product has been checked out.

Reviews.Title: This is a great deal.
Reviews.Author: Rob Ferris
Reviews.Content: A great starter for our chidren. Easy to set up and operate. Great price. Looks cool too. I will buy another soon for our family.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 10.1
Reviews.Author: T. Brown
Reviews.Content: For the price it's an Okay product. Upside - decent screen resolution, relatively easy system navigation and great for reading. Downside - disappointing the operating system does not allow access to Google market. Fix is download of apk file but a pain for a new product based on Android. Speaker sound quality okay but with ear buds no problem.

Reviews.Title: Buen tablet
Reviews.Author: ogl10
Reviews.Content: Este tablet, es muy práctico para un uso basico, juegos,web,reader...el unico punto en contra q le veo es la camara q es de muy baja resolución y solo trae enfrente...no atrás

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: carlos acosta
Reviews.Content: I did not need a lot of apps or connectivity and product delivered waht advertised, But I was disappointment with was avaialble and still hving issues with downloading. customer service below awful

Reviews.Title: I must do to solve my problem
Reviews.Author: lidia
Reviews.Content: my tablet does not work is damaged, my problem is that I'm in Venezuela and I would like a new one or my money back, I'm not happy with my purchase is the second I buy but I came damaged

Reviews.Title: I am please with this item!
Reviews.Author: NDeMille
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this Tablet!  It does what I bought it for.  It is not limited to only one kind of reading files.  You can download Kindle, Nook and other files!  The only thing that I wish it had was Google Play.  I still need to root mine so I can get into Google Play.  I would recommend this. exspecially if you want to just read or play games!  The size is not too big and not too small.  I believe it is sized right for all ages!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy Coby products
Reviews.Author: tawnya
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 different Coby Kyros Androids on Black Friday 2012. Here it is 18 Jan 2013 and both products are defective. I called Coby customer service and they were no help. The Wi-Fi capabilities for whatever reason goes out. Read reviews on Google. Splurge and get a better product. You will save in the long run. I am in the market for a new tablet for school. Suggestions?

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: pablo
Reviews.Content: easy to used my little daughter love it. I recommended purchase this item only thing don't give 5 star is why I can't install google play.

Reviews.Title: Never buy this product
Reviews.Author: Saint Paul mom
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product for a Christmas gift for my elementary school aged daughter, thinking that it would be good enough for the games, videos and books she reads, and we could save a little bit of money.  After the initial hassle trying to get apps to work, it was ok (I followed the Q&A; on amazon to set up the app store). But after two weeks it stopped charging and it was a huge hassle trying to get anyone from the manufacturer to respond to my service request.  Now I am supposed to send it in to the manufacturer for repair or replacement, but I also have to include a money order for $15 to cover the return shipping.  Apparently they don't support their product enough to be able to cover the shipping costs for their customers - and no personal checks or credit cards are accepted for the return shipping payment.Incidentally, I also purchased the extended warranty, but they won't cover this because they say it is still covered under manufacturers warranty.  At this point, I just want my money back and to never look at this piece of junk again.Now that the prices for Kindle Fire have gone down, I just ordered one of those.  The cost difference is not that much anymore and I have had a great experience with my Kindle.It was definitely not worth the $50 price difference to order the COBY product.  It is unusable after less than one month.

Reviews.Title: Still learning
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 11 year old daughter for Christmas....so far it hasn't been what I expected.  We are still learning how to download things and at times there are apps that show up in the "get jar" that just won't download.  I believed that this was going to have the google play store and it doesn't.  Still deciding on what exactly to do with it...

Reviews.Title: Our tablet
Reviews.Author: Sheila McCabe
Reviews.Content: We as a family have enjoyed the tablet......We love the size of the screen and are thinking about buying a few more for the house.

Reviews.Title: Our tablet
Reviews.Author: Sheila McCabe
Reviews.Content: We as a family have enjoyed the tablet......We love the size of the screen and are thinking about buying a few more for the house.

Reviews.Title: Best Christmas Present for the right price!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: A.Cornwell
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet that could meet the needs of my 12 year old son without having to spend close to a mortgage payment to get it. I had went through all the tablets on Amazon and other websites and this tablet had the best reviews.. Although it does not have Google play to download apps, The amazon Marketplace is spectacular, My son was so excited and has not put it down since he got it for Christmas. He is happy and that lets me know that I made the right choice for him..The pages load pretty quickly the apps are up to date and download with no problem and most of the popular ones are free. So I have no complaints at all .. He can listen to Pandora all day and the battery life does not die very quickly as I have seen in most reviews about the android tablet..

Reviews.Title: Simplicity is elegance
Reviews.Author: Genna Yeater
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT (Except I can't leave it at that because more words are required) LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: CD
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my grandsons. They love them both.cant beat the price.theyre still working away and they're are pretty tough,also. Cuz them boys don't go easy on things.highly recommend

Reviews.Title: coby customer service
Reviews.Author: Felix Izquierdo
Reviews.Content: i purcsed this tab and i love it. it is everythign it says it is. no problems w netflix/amazon video, no problems at all.it has a front and rear cameras.. the sound could be better, but hey, i am not complaining, ok? downloads videos/music, i mean for my needs it's the best, and it did not cost me a bundle....i would buy another one, anytime.........Coby Kyros 9.7-Inch Android 4.0 8 GB Internet Tablet 4:3 Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen with Built-In Camera, Black MID9740-8July 31 '2013I bought it i dec 2012 in april 2013 i began to have problems shutting down. I sent it coby for repairs or replacement, they still have it and there is no way to contact them anymore, when u call their phone number u get sent to thei web page. U send them emails a no one responds. I wonder if amazon can do something about this problem. So i filed a complaint with the bbb and im waiting for an answer.So if u have issues w tablets good luck you.....

Reviews.Title: Rate
Reviews.Author: Rosie
Reviews.Content: Coby kyros. Arrepentida de haber hecho la compra, tengo ya casi un mes de tener la tableta y no puedo bajar nada ( don't have the white shopping bag),he llamado a servicio al cliente y nadie atiende , ustedes me pueden ayudar??

Reviews.Title: Not my thing
Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: I ended up giving this to my son for Christmas it was totally not my thing very hard to use.

Reviews.Title: Terrible performance did not meet the expected mímimo. Overall I confirmed with another product I bought the Coby brand is of ve
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Solis
Reviews.Content: Pros:Low cost, good presentationCons:Applications are frozen, you have to be constantly resetting the system under performance. It is certified with Google play this is a serious disadvantage, each parameter to be configured to emulate the operation over other brands is simply impossible. Applications start working for a while and a few days stop working.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL!
Reviews.Author: Susan Manuel "Camryn's Mom"
Reviews.Content: This product ran great for about a week. It was never slow, connected to the wifi every time, never had a problem.  After about three or four uses, the screen went blank and it would not even turn on.  I returned this product.  Such a shame because, like I said, it ran great when it was being used.

Reviews.Author: ivan zinkiv
Reviews.Content: i got this item in four days after when i order this wright to my door no problems happy whith

Reviews.Title: Coby tablet
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: We bought each of our kids these as Christmas presents (ages 8 and 11). Love the tablet. I did download amazon App Store like some other reviews recommended and use that more than the Getjar one installed for apps. We were able to download all the popular games. Netflix works well and doesn't lag. Speed is decent. Overall it's totally worth the money. We have had no problems with either one. Camera isn't the greatest but takes decent pics.

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed it for 5 days
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: My first tablet, finally got myself a wireless gizmo.  Hooked up wifi at my home, was happy with it.  Today I turned it on and half my folders were gone.  I had to re-install a bunch of stuff it "lost".  NOT FUN.  One reason I got a device like this is that I'm an artist and I want to have my portfolio available when I want to show it to people.  Yes, my stuff is online too but simply having the photos available on the tablet was what I wanted.  Now I have to wonder every time I turn it on if everything is going to be there.  Not happy.  ALSO, you know all those cool apps you can attach?  This device doesn't accept Google Play, so be prepared to sit there in frustration as app after app after app says "Sorry dude, this device doesn't support that feature".  DON'T BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: brenda
Reviews.Content: veiwing web pages is slow to load. Tablet wil freeze up when trying to load. Have to wait and start over

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: notatallhappy
Reviews.Content: This product is just not good quality.I purchased it for my grandson for Christmas and he used it for 1 week and it just stopped working.The return policy is clear.No warranty just return if it is not open.I would not recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Coby Tablet
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: I figured that instead of always carrying my laptop around, i can now carry my tablet and still have the same features with less baggage. It works good, however, sometimes the browser locks up but that might just be because of signal problems in the area where I live. Good choice guys.

Reviews.Title: Love my Cobe Kyros Tablet
Reviews.Author: John Obie
Reviews.Content: Everything about this product is greatWish the battery lasted longer but otherwise it is perfect for my needsWould highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Good!!!
Reviews.Author: solidr
Reviews.Content: Very Good for the price, if you have kids, this is the best option under $100, of course. Android 4, 1 gb ram, 7" screen. WiFi connection good very good!

Reviews.Title: Worst Tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Benja
Reviews.Content: This thing is a piece of junk, The app market that comes with it is very small and only has worthless apps. They say to use the Amazon app store but it is very unstable on this tablet and crashes after every 2 or 3 downloads and must be reinstalled. You will be much happier with a more reliable brand such as the google or samsung tablets.. This is deffinatly a mistake to buy even for the price. It only works sometimes and the touch sensitivity is really bad.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Beaver
Reviews.Content: It is not responsive to the touch like a touch screen smart phone, or apple product. I have had to touch several times before it responds a lot. Would not recommend if you have already used apple products or good smart phones. You will get frustrated. Might recommend for kids who have never used other devices. I bought this for my 3rd grader who has used a touch screen iPod, but he wanted a bigger screen. Both of us get frustrated trying to use it because we are used to good quality products. Now he doesn't use it, and has gone back to his iPod. If I could go back would spend a little more for one of the other brands like amazon or google.

Reviews.Title: not so good.
Reviews.Author: Arturo
Reviews.Content: The upper part of the screen has less sensitivity and I have a hard time for it to respond to the touch. It came with no headphones and the battery life needs improvement. Reviews.Title: The Good and the UGLY - DOES NOT HAVE standard built-iin USB port.
Reviews.Author: Iher
Reviews.Content: i am afraid there is no in-between for me.history: i got two of those for family members overseas to do video chat with, check email, basic browsing of the internet, some photos and little music.the Good: surprisingly good performance for an 'under $100' tablet. i personally own an iPad and this just surpassed my expectations in regards to how well it works. the build quality is not bad either. feels sturdy and snug in your hands. it is responsive, loads pages correctly and quickly... email set up was easy. few apps were downloaded from their "G" app - no problem.the UGLY: the USB, they claim they have built-in, NOT. this is a one way, USB-out (male) connection that you can use to connect the tablet TO your computer. kind of like, the tablet is an accessory to your hosting computer. if you want to attach an actual accessory to the tablet - you have to get something, like a keyboard, that has a MICRO usb output, and make sure IT IS Android compatible. #2 - the suggested by amazon USB case/keyboard???? WTH??? another NOT. do not get it. it will have no port to plug it into. i ordered a male to male usb adaptor, does not work with it either. i then got a mini usb version of the same keyboard/case, does not work, as the actual port on the side of the tablet is MICRO USB. NOT mentioned in the description, it only lists USB. i had to spend countless hours online and read bunch of reviews suggesting the class of this port to figure out what it was - because the manufacturer does not say it. i even called them, and their agent would not classify the type of connection this has - she just said, it is one of their "proprietary" ports? WHAT????so, by far, tablet works surprisingly good for $100. deceptive USB connectivity in the description though. one of my tablets was already sent to the family member before i figured out the above, so the keyboard was a waste of money there... i still  have #2 here and am determined to  make sure the accessories i bought for it work - few more days before i get the replacement MICRO usb keyboard/case. i will post an update if keyboard works or not.UPDATE - 1/15/12Finally, i was able to find a keyboard that works with this thing. it is the "DIAOTEC (TM) Synthetic Leather Keyboard Case with micro-USB plug for 7 inch Tablet Computers" which i purchased from here for $13. NOTE: it's the one with MICRO-USB, not mini, not standard, but MICRO-USB.

Reviews.Content: Well given that I live in the Caribbean and the warranty is for the USA it was a gamble for me to purchase it. After 1 month there is a faulty display. When it powers on the display jumps. Emailed Coby for warranty concerns they said its a faulty unit and to return it. The cost to return is the same price if I was to purchase another unit... just to return to the USA makes no logical since to do such because of the cost attached.My experience with this purchase was not a pleasant one.

Reviews.Title: I wish I could give it 0 stars
Reviews.Author: Mandy M Rourke
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet a few months ago.  It never was able to connect to my home wireless router.  Occasionally I could get it to connect to wifi at the library or restaurants, but what is the use if I can't use it at home?  After about a month and a half it crashed.  I called technical assistance and they told me to send it back for a replacement.  After 3 weeks of waiting for my replacement I finally called customer service and they told me it would take "at least" another 6-8 weeks because they were doing inventory and could not access their computer system.  Spend the extra money to get a decent tablet.  This one does not work and the customer services is terrible.

Reviews.Title: Graduation gift
Reviews.Author: Donna Woolf
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son's graduation, he seems to like it, just isn't where he gets great Wifi right now thats his only complaint!

Reviews.Title: would not recommend
Reviews.Author: killercolors
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this tablet to a friend to say the least. For me it does what I needed it to do. Read e-books. I get advanced e-books from writers in exchange for reviews and I was in need of a tablet so I wouldn't be forced to sit on my hard (now 10 yr old) computer chair and read. It reads all media files pertaining to e-books and I'm happy with that, but when I first got it I made the mistake of trying to turn it on without charging it as I was spoiled by my Samsung Galaxy player that was fully charged out the box. Needless to say I got the white screen of warning, not death, but it wasn't a pleasant thing to see. Upon charging it, it worked fine.But now the downsides. The WiFi sucks. Plain and simple. I was sitting no less than a foot from my router and it refused to connect. I had to go into my router settings and rescan channels for it to work. And let me say it only works on wireless channel 11. Anything else and it refuses to pick up the connection. GetJar also sucks. No apps what-so-ever. Again I'm use to having Google Play at my finger tips and the Amazon shop app does not like this tablet. Yes it works, but it's slow and clunky feeling as it chugs along. The main reason I got this tablet was because it was larger and had android 4.0, so let me also state that flash does not work on this tablet as Adobe is no longer offering it for anything above 4.0. You can't side load it either. Yes it will install, but it won't work.Now lately the screen flickers half of the background image from left to right before it settles itself. Despite the wifi problem I've ways of by-passing that and the screen flickering recently I'm going to keep it as I don't have the time to stand in line at walmart and return it and then wait 3 days to see my money back in my account only to have to go hunting again. In the end it does what I need it to to. Read e-books.

Reviews.Content: I was very dissapointed that there is no play store, no facebook app, no yahoo... I might as well of took my $200 cause I bought 2 of them and gave it away.... But otherwise yeh its decent

And wanted to be able to install the kindle app and some games.I feel like I am being nice when I call it slow and aggravating.  often a touch is not enough when a touch is all it is supposed to take.  The screen does a frustrating magnify/demagnify when you are trying to get some button to function and you cannot turn the manure off.  Getting the screen to slide is *

Reviews.Title: Coby
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: Was what I thought , Wish I could get Google play on it for downloads.  For the price it's a good Starter.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet but this unit had flaw .
Reviews.Author: R. Walthers
Reviews.Content: Coby Kyros mid1042-8 worked well for a couple weeks and had no problems at first when connecting to USB connector .Unit would go into usb mode when radio button on screen was touched and showed as removable device in Computer directory of my computer .(both laptop & desktop ).  But after I connected after doing it successfully several times ,Coby screen would flash between homescreen and turn on usb screen rapidly till settled on home screen .Lower task bar on home screen showed usb icon and it indicated it was in usb mode .  My computer would not detect it as removable drive . No detection no matter what computer or usb cord I used. Have owned other Coby's and they worked well .Think this was probably just a fluke and did an exchange for another unit of same model.Hopefully there'll be no further problems . I would still highly recommend Coby but time will tell if that will apply to this particular unit.Coby Kyros 10.1-Inch Android 4.0 8 GB 16:9 Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen Widescreen Internet Tablet with Built-In Camera, Black MID1042-8 Well I received the replacement Coby of the same model ,and when transferring files by USB I have experience similar problems as with the first Coby . 2 units with similar problems seem a little unusual .The experience with these 2 tablets don't make me want to write off Coby completely . I've not had much problem with previous models of Coby I've purchased . But I'm not sure what the issue could be with these 2 tablets,I'm no expert so I don't know the problem didn't occur because I did something incorrectly or there may have been issues with the USB port of my computers or even the cord. So I thought requesting a refund and investing in a different tablet after some research into some reviews may help me make a better choice and hopfully there'll be no more issues.

Reviews.Title: Very bad applications!

Reviews.Content: The only problem with this product is that it does not have the Google Play store, to download applications, and can not be installed due to their software. The tablet comes with a application called "Getjar" which replaces it, and is very poor with respect the applications to download.

Reviews.Title: Meh, not as reliable as I'd thought it would be.
Reviews.Author: O.Rodriguest
Reviews.Content: So this tablet isn't compatible with GooglePlay store apps. You can download most of the stuff you want illegally, but the tablet doesn't run it reliably. I'm using it as a reader, for quickly checking email, and typing notes in class. I bought the tablet as part of an effort to digitize all of my pdfs and notes and eventually make them all searchable. I wasn't expecting anything fancy, I just expected it not to crash with one app open.But with this tablet, I've had apps just not work and not open. I'm in class and my note-taking app stops working or the tablet takes 10 minutes to turn on. Either way, I end up using a piece of paper. I'll be able to open some word documents for viewing, and not others.It's very frustrating and there doesn't seem to any rhyme or reason.Really, just save up for something better or buy a used netbook. At this point, a $.50 notebook is more stable.

Reviews.Title: Coby SUCKS!!!!
Reviews.Author: Traci Chute
Reviews.Content: This one does anyway. This is my second one, and I'm not happy at ALL!!! Very upset and disappointed in Amazon for selling this item. The first one I bought, had to be returned, due to a problem with the mini USB port on the tablet. Now this second one, that was sent to replace the first, is HORRIBLE!!! Every day it loses my apps, ebooks, and has to be reset and sd card reloaded. I'm fed up with this brand! I FINALLY talked to someone at Amazon, and I'm now getting a refund, which in turn I'll use to buy another brand.

Reviews.Title: Good product 100% Recommended
Reviews.Author: Jean Carlos Contreras
Reviews.Content: Good product 100% RecommendedChoosing this rating because it is a great productI would recommend this product to everyone100% Recommended

Reviews.Content: The price shows its quality. Customer service doesn't exist. Its not compatible with google play. In order for it to be so you have to root it and good luck doing that. Its near impossible because you cant access the boot sector like you normally should. Its a pain in the butt. The screen cracked within a month of purchase and all it took was a simple flick of the wrist. Cheap construction. A total bummer. Icecream sandwhich is a plus. But if you want quality look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet

Reviews.Title: Product exploded and caught on fire in my 3 year olds hands.
Reviews.Author: Joshua J. Smith "Apriil"
Reviews.Content: At first I thought this tablet was excellent for the price. It was exactly what we were looking for until ome day while my 3 year son was playing with it, it started to make a hissing noise, smoking, battery exploded and caught on fire. Luckily I was next to him to knock it out of his hands right away unfortunately onto my just over a year new couch. God forbid I wasn't there. He was not hurt, just scared and in shock. He still is upset when he remembers that his tablet is gone and what happened. His twin sister has the same one and that was placed in a metal box and stored in the garage.I did contact the company and we are still in the middle of this ordeal. I do not reccommend buying until they fix this issue.

Coby Kyros 7-Inch Android 4.0 4 GB Internet Tablet 16:9 Capacitive Multi-Touch Widescreen  Black MID7035-4.  Very difficult to download apps using GetJar.  Most of the time message says "failed to install".  Basically bought the tablet to download education material like reading, math etc. Doesn't seem to work.  Crashed within the first hour of use.  Blank white screen won't shut down.  Had to drain the battery overnight and recharge in the morning and reset the whole thing. Downloaded a simple math. Message came "X Application not installed". Need help from anyone!

Reviews.Title: New 7 inch, same old story
Reviews.Author: J. Bogart
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my mom's upcoming birthday. What attracted me to it was the $99 price tag, the 1 GB of RAM, upgradeable storage, and since this is Coby's updated 7 inch tablet, the compatibility with the Amazon market. The tablet has several major flaws. First, the one little speaker. The sound was terrible, muffled, distorted, (insert adjective here). Second, although there is no Google Play, my previous experience with the 1mobilemarket and the Amazon market was positive, so I figured I would install them and have access to most of the desired apps. However, both markets had issues installing, downloading and updating apps, you name it. The next flaw is that even without the apps, the tablet would crash on occasion from casual web browsing and had to be reset several times. The battery life would last around 3 hours of moderate use at best, depending on the level of brightness that was selected. The clarity of the screen is ok, but when compared to a higher quality tablet, there is a huge difference. I had high hopes for this tablet, but for $99, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: The negative reviewers were right
Reviews.Author: Merri-Todd Webster "Writer, musician, and fri...
Reviews.Content: Sadly, I am returning this item after a week of frustration with it. My main motivation for getting a tablet this size was so that I could connect to a keyboard and be able to write, anywhere, any time, and have the option of listening to music at the same time.It's just not possible. I'm confident the item was in good condition and Amazon is not at fault, but it just won't do two things at once. My attempt to listen to a playlist and use a word processing app resulted in distortion of the music. Overall, it is the slowest, clunkiest computer of any kind that I have used in ages. If you touch the screen before your browser has fully loaded a page, it kindly informs you that the browser is not responding and asks if you would like to close it. It integrates poorly with Google apps. Its wifi connection is unreliable. The screen is often unresponsive, and the orientation shift is clumsy. I hate to think how a game like Angry Birds would play on it. I do not recommend this product.I gave my Kindle Fire to my husband because his KF was having problems recharging. I have missed it for a whole week. If the other Kindle continues to have trouble, I will buy a new Kindle Fire HD in preference to a larger tablet.

Reviews.Title: Very limited on apps and features
Reviews.Author: JonnyC
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Coby Kyros 10.1-Inch for my wife. It was a decent price and seemed to be exactly what she needed, however, after receiving it we were less than pleased. There is no way to get Google Play apps on this, and so cannot download any apps that are provided through them. There is talk of 'rooting' it to provide this service, but with it being so new there isn't any reliable instructions on how to do this. The app download program that comes with it only offers a few free apps, none that I believe you could ever really use.Forget watching HD youtube videos on this. I'm not sure if it is the browser or the tablet but HD videos online take a long time to load, and once they do it freezes when playing to reload again. VERY FRUSTRATING!! (I know it's not the internet, because my laptop and smartphone play the same videos great.)This tablet may be a good price (a little expensive for what it offers though), but you will be VERY limited on what you can do. No HD youtube videos and no Google Play. The instructions that are provided leave a lot to be desired and this tablet can be very user unfriendly.Purchase with caution! (You get what you pay for!)

Reviews.Title: MID9042-8  Wifi Issues
Reviews.Author: Bdub "Bdub"
Reviews.Content: I really wanted this tablet to work out.  I owned a MID7022 for about 8 months before it died.  Luckily I had purchased the warranty so figured I'd give Coby one more try.  I really like the screen, response, look of ICS and price of the MID9042.  And the 9" widescreen was perfect.  Unfortunately I am returning it.My main problem was the internet surfing.  The system would show:Status: ConnectedSignal Strength: ExcellentLink Speed: 58MbpsSecurity: WPA2 PSKIP address: *****However at the same time I would also get "Amazon.com might be temporarily unavailable".  I would get this for numerous other sites as well.  This would happen about 90% of the time.  When I was able to surf it worked fine.  I have no issues connecting and surfing with the wifi on my phone, netbook or laptop.I tried the reset option in settings, used the reset hole and reset the tablet to factory settings (hold down volume and power at the same time).  Nothing helped.  Very dissapointed.Now I'm trying to decide.  Should I try one more MID9042?  See if Amazon will eventually sell the MID1045?  Or buy a refurb/used TF101, SL101 or Thrive from the Amazon Warehouse?  I'd like one of the big name brand tablets but don't want to pay the high new device price.So very dissapointed this tablet did not work out for me.

Now I can watch youtube, and go to any website and watch movies without closing unexpectedly. The main problem was Getjar that acts like google play store. After the update I got rid of getjar and install Mobomarket. The tablet is working just fine, and with so many cool android app on mobomarket, it makes your tablet brand new. Now I have google map unlike before. I downloaded and updated all necessary apps. Bottom line, the update to my ES file explorer change everything.

Another down side to this tablet is that it does not have GooglePlay.  Instead, it comes with the Getjar market place.  There's no application in Getjar that I want.  Basically, this tablet is useless with the networking problem and lack of GooglePlay.

Reviews.Author: Holly Henry
Reviews.Content: I am trying to find a tablet that is user friendly to my five year old.. She likes to play games, take pics and listen to music.. I was thinking about getting an iPad for myself, but want her to have her own device to play with.. But I need to know if this would be best.. I got her an innotab last year and she does not like it.. I think it's too basic and doesn't have enough technology options.. Can anyone give me advice on wether this is a good choice and how I would be able to get the google play app so she can download games due to us having wifi at home.. Or if it already comes with it?!? Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the unbelievable price! ...
Reviews.Author: Carlos Sieveres
Reviews.Content: Excellent product for the unbelievable price! ...It was just what I was looking for and works prefect and correctly! ...I could not have picked a better ...5 Stars for esrte product! ..

Reviews.Title: Description does not match actual item
Reviews.Author: kwiltz55
Reviews.Content: The description clearly says 2 2.0 USB and 2 3.0 USB.  There is one USB and 1 HDMI.  Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: not what i was expecting
Reviews.Author: Dan "My first novel will be available when i ...
Reviews.Content: The good.Movie player and music player apps are great and can watch movies from SD card without issues.web browser is fine and does all you would require (unless you want to watch any flash player content)The Bad.First of all, the battery can last as short as 45 mins of constant use.cannot run flash player, so no access to netflix.The inbuilt memory wants to put all apps on the 250mb boot drive meaning you fill the memory real quick and after 20 or so apps your storage is full (even with a massive SD card)The real kicker and why i am so dissapointed with this machine, is the fact that it is not compatible with the google play android market.So 90% of the apps i wanted to use were unavailable to me.Getting the machine to boot up at times can be a nightmare as it sits there for up to 10 mins showing the coby screen.After only having the thing for a week or so i have had to use a pin to reset it 6 times as it can just lock up and do nothing.not a good buy imo.

Reviews.Title: Awful  MID1042-8
Reviews.Author: William Masterson
Reviews.Content: Purchased one of these new.  It would not connect with the router unless your were holding it virtually on top of it. All my other laptops of various makes, HP, Accer, Dell and 1st gen Ipad, Wii game console etc. detect and hook up with the rotor which is one story down.  They also pick up all of the other routers operating in the neighborhood within a block or so.  Not this one. In the instruction booklet it says you must be within 300 feet of the router - try 3 feet.When it did hook up, the browser would not open any web pages.  I sent it back and will bite the bullet and spring for another Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Not off to a good start!
Reviews.Author: Kvaughn
Reviews.Content: Just received the product, pulled it out of the box, got 100% charge on the battery and it will NOT let me turn on the WiFi! I have a wireless router in addition to a personal hotspot available for connection, but the device wont even let me turn WiFi on to connect to any of the available connections! I guess you really do get what you pay for. Went to the Coby sight for troubleshooting...no help.

Reviews.Title: COby MDI1042 Poor performance
Reviews.Author: downunder56
Reviews.Content: Can't ask more for the price, but expected the item to perform better based on previous reviews listed. It constantly locks up. Camera has very bad resolution, does not have the reverse camera and the quality is very bad. While using Adobe reader or other epub reader the performance is very slow, screen turning is not as I expected. Very disappointed with its performance, not a good buy. There are other products of similar price that are much better than this one.

Reviews.Title: Wtf
Reviews.Author: Dani
Reviews.Content: My son just got this yesterday and already this so much going wrong. At just 35% battery it flashes off and on continusly I haven't fully charged it yet but that can't be normal. Google play won't download and google plus keeps crashing as soon as it opens. The app center that comes on there barely have anything, Netflix took two times to download it on here. I hate that there is only a front camera so I guess he can only take pics of himself. I am so irked, I hope this is just a defected one which is still bad but this can't be as good as it get.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, slow, you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Dcearley
Reviews.Content: I was originally excited to see such a great deal on a large tablet. I ordered it right away. It turns out you can't get any good apps because you can't use google play app store. I tried rooting the thing, but it was complex. If you do searches for drivers, rooting or google play, you will see what everyone else is experiencing. It was also sluggish at times. Save yourself the time and energy and avoid this item. I have decided to pay the $200 more and get an iPad. I have an android phone, so I understand the OS and how it works.. I like my phone (although I liked my iPhone better).BOTTOM LINE: SKIP THIS ITEM, THERE IS A REASON IT IS SO CHEAP!!!!

Reviews.Title: Its crap!!!!!
Reviews.Author: BRAD ALLEN
Reviews.Content: It has a few apps that you can download, but not the ones you want.  Like facebook or netflixs.  I got this for my mother so it would be easier for her to navigate then her computer.  I am sending it back!!!

Reviews.Title: yo x 2
Reviews.Author: yo
Reviews.Content: so far so good ,hope it holds up 2 my only Daughter's abuse.  Works good except she says she can,t video chat skype on it ???

Reviews.Title: my worst buy ever
Reviews.Author: Cherylann Bryan
Reviews.Content: This is my worst bought item ever. Since I bought the coby for my husband n i. It has been giving trouble, it freezes, don't run my programs, I can't even download game apps from amazon app store and I can't connect to the sever for my email to be set up. I want some form of refund back for all coby's we bought.
